translation.en: [man] No live organism can continue to exist sanely
translation.fr:
Aucun être vivant
ne peut subsister sainement,

translation.en: under conditions of absolute reality.
Even larks and katydids are supposed by some to dream.
translation.fr:
Même les alouettes et les sauterelles
seraient capables de rêver.

translation.en: Hill House, not sane...
stood by itself against its hills holding darkness within.
translation.fr:
se tenait à l'écart sur les collines
et abritait les ténèbres.

translation.en: It had stood so for a hundred years before my family moved in...
translation.fr:
Elle existait depuis un siècle,
avant que ma famille ne s'y installe,

translation.en: and might stand a hundred more.
Within, walls stood upright,
translation.fr: À l'intérieur, les murs étaient droits,

translation.en: bricks met neatly...
floors were firm.
Silence lay steadily against the wood and stone of Hill House.
translation.fr:
Le silence pesait lourdement
sur le bois et la pierre de Hill House.

translation.en: And whatever walked there...
translation.fr: Et ce qui arpentait ses couloirs

translation.en: walked alone.
It's okay, Theo. Go back to bed.
translation.fr: Ça va, Theo. Retourne au lit.

translation.en: Should I wake up Mom and Dad?
[boy] I've got it.
You okay, Nellie?
You scared?
That's okay.
I get scared too sometimes.
Why are you awake, Luke? 'Cause Nellie's awake.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi tu dors pas, Luke ?
- Parce qu'elle est réveillée.

translation.en: -[boy] What was it? -The Bent-Neck Lady.
translation.fr: C'était quoi ? La Dame au cou tordu.

translation.en: Oh, her again?
-Where was she? -[quavering]
[man] Oh, boy.
I guess we better take a look.
translation.fr: Je vais y jeter un œil.

translation.en: -Here, huh? -Mm-hmm.
Your big brother must have scared her away. Big brothers are good like that.
translation.fr:
Ton grand frère a dû l'effrayer.
C'est son rôle.

translation.en: [Nell] What if she's hiding?
[man] She's long gone.
I guess everybody can go back to bed now.
There you go.
[sighs] You remember what we talked about before?
translation.fr: Tu te rappelles ce que j'ai dit ?

translation.en: About our dreams?
They can spill.
[man] That's right.
Yeah,
just like a cup of water can spill sometimes.
translation.fr: Comme un verre d'eau qui déborde.

translation.en: But kids' dreams are special.
-They're like... -[whispers] An ocean.
-An ocean. -[man] That's right.
And the big dreams...
can spill out sometimes.
Back to bed, Stevie.
Now, I know that Bent-Neck Lady is really scary.
translation.fr:
Je sais que la Dame au cou tordu
est terrifiante.

translation.en: But that's all she is. She's just a little spill.
translation.fr:
Mais ce n'est rien
qu'un petit débordement.

translation.en: How long do we have to live here, Daddy?
translation.fr: Combien de temps on va vivre ici, papa ?

translation.en: Well, your mother and I, we have to finish fixing this house,
translation.fr:
Eh bien, ta maman et moi devons
finir les travaux de cette maison.

translation.en: and then someone has to buy it.
Then we can go?
Yep, and then we can go, just like the last house.
translation.fr: Oui, on pourra partir. Comme la dernière fois.

translation.en: Now, you get back to sleep, both of you.
I love you, sweetie.
Sweet dreams.
Dancing in the Red Room.
You're dreaming, Shirl.
The pandas aren't dreaming.
Pandas, huh?
Pandas don't eat macaroni.
translation.fr: Les pandas mangent pas de pâtes.

translation.en: [sighs] Noted.
Everyone alive?
-Nellie had a nightmare. -[inhales deeply]
And Shirley's sleep talking again.
translation.fr: Et Shirley parle dans son sommeil.

translation.en: Anything good?
Pandas don't like macaroni, Liv.
translation.fr: Les pandas n'aiment pas les pâtes.

translation.en: Luke?
Carl was driving on Rural 86 during the storm.
translation.fr:
Carl roulait sur une petite route,
pendant la tempête.

translation.en: Do you remember that storm?
Oh, of course not, you were in LA.
translation.fr: Non. Vous étiez à Los Angeles.

translation.en: And it was a bad one.
It was cats and dogs. The worst I'd seen in ten years.
translation.fr:
Il tombait des cordes.
C'était la pire en dix ans.

translation.en: He was up in the boons when he lost control of the car.
translation.fr:
Il était au milieu de nulle part
quand il a perdu le contrôle.

translation.en: He went over a guardrail and went down a ravine.
translation.fr:
Il a percuté une rambarde
et a fini dans le ravin.

translation.en: The car flipped over, and you couldn't see it from the road,
translation.fr: La voiture s'est retournée et était cachée

translation.en: especially because of the rain.
He was hanging there the whole time.
translation.fr: Il était suspendu, tout ce temps.

translation.en: Hours.
Upside-down, tangled up in his seat belt.
translation.fr: À l'envers, emmêlé dans sa ceinture.

translation.en: They said he could reach the horn, but...
translation.fr: Il a réussi à atteindre le klaxon,

translation.en: he couldn't press it for long 'cause, you see, his arm was broken.
translation.fr:
mais n'a pas pu appuyer longtemps,
son bras était cassé.

translation.en: And that's how he died.
translation.fr: Et il est mort comme ça.

translation.en: Upside-down, pressing on that horn for as long as he could stand to.
translation.fr:
À l'envers, la main sur le klaxon,
jusqu'à l'épuisement.

translation.en: So... when did it start?
translation.fr: Quand est-ce que ça a commencé ?

translation.en: [voice trembling] The night after he died. It started with drops of water.
translation.fr: La nuit suivant sa mort. Au départ, c'étaient des gouttes d'eau.

translation.en: Like raindrops... falling onto my face.
translation.fr:
Comme des gouttes de pluie,
coulant sur mon visage.

translation.en: I started to hear a car horn.
Short bursts.
Distant, I think, but close enough to wake me,
translation.fr:
Lointain,
mais assez proche pour me réveiller.

translation.en: and then, finally-- Now, this was right after the funeral itself.
translation.fr:
L'autre épisode s'est produit
juste après les funérailles,

translation.en: This was the night after the burial, you see.
I felt the water... on my cheeks...
translation.fr: J'ai senti de l'eau couler sur mes joues

translation.en: and I heard the car horn...
and then, I looked up at the ceiling...
And there he was...
hanging there...
upside-down.
I could-- I could see the water...
dripping off of his hair,
and his face was a...
a deep purple, like the blood had all just...
translation.fr:
pourpre, comme si son sang s'était concentré
dans ses joues.

translation.en: pooled into his cheeks.
translation.fr:
comme si son sang s'était concentré
dans ses joues.

translation.en: It's funny, you'd think you'd scream after seeing something like that, but you don't.
translation.fr:
C'est étrange, on s'imagine crier
en voyant ça, mais non.

translation.en: You just stare.
You just stare at it like you're an idiot.
And then, his mouth fell open,
but it wasn't a scream.
translation.fr: mais ce n'était pas un cri,

translation.en: It was a car horn...
coming from his mouth...
so loud.
So loud that I fell off the bed.
translation.fr: Si fort que je suis tombée du lit,

translation.en: And then, I screamed.
I screamed because I hit the floor, and it startled me,
translation.fr:
J'ai crié car j'ai sursauté
en percutant le sol.

translation.en: and it was like I only just remembered, "Oh, right. I can scream.
translation.fr:
Comme si je venais de me souvenir
que je pouvais crier.

translation.en: I should probably scream." And I screamed, all right.
translation.fr: Que je devrais sûrement crier. Alors, j'ai crié,

translation.en: And I ran, and I tripped in the hallway,
translation.fr: couru et trébuché dans le couloir,

translation.en: and I looked back, and he wasn't there, and then I laid there and I cried.
translation.fr: et il avait disparu. Je me suis allongée en sanglots.

translation.en: And that was the last time I've slept in that room.
translation.fr: Je n'ai plus dormi dans cette chambre.

translation.en: That's a very interesting story, Mrs. Walker.
Irene.
Irene...
This is what I'd like to do. I'd like to look around your house.
translation.fr:
J'aimerais faire ceci. Inspecter la maison
et installer du matériel.

translation.en: I'd like to set up some equipment.
translation.fr:
Inspecter la maison
et installer du matériel.

translation.en: I'd also like to sleep in that room tonight.
Goodness.
I'll be fine.
I can't promise I'll include your story in my book.
translation.fr: Je n'écrirai peut-être pas votre histoire.

translation.en: -Of course. -[man] But it's possible.
And I thank you for sharing it with me.
I'm sorry, I should have told you I'm a fan.
translation.fr:
Navrée.
J'aurais dû vous prévenir, je suis fan.

translation.en: That's my favorite, the first one.
"Silence lay steadily against the wood and stone at Hill House,
translation.fr:
"Le silence pesait lourdement
sur le bois et la pierre de Hill House.

translation.en: and whatever walked there... walked alone."
translation.fr:
Et ce qui arpentait ses couloirs
était singulier."

translation.en: I can't imagine what it was like living there.
translation.fr: Ça devait pas être facile d'y vivre.

translation.en: The most famous haunted house in America.
translation.fr: La plus célèbre maison hantée du pays.

translation.en: In fairness... it wasn't famous when we moved in.
translation.fr:
Pour tout vous dire,
elle n'était pas connue, à l'époque.

translation.en: And besides, you've got me beat.
What do you mean?
I mean, if you actually saw your husband hanging upside-down over your bed,
translation.fr:
Si vous avez vraiment vu
votre mari suspendu à l'envers,

translation.en: you've seen more than I ever have.
translation.fr: vous en avez vu plus que moi.

translation.en: I've never seen a ghost.
-But your books? -Ah, not in Arlington.
translation.fr:
Mais vos livres... Ni à Arlington, ni à Danvers,
ni à Alcatraz,

translation.en: Danvers, Alcatraz,
translation.fr:
Ni à Arlington, ni à Danvers,
ni à Alcatraz,

translation.en: on the Queen Mary or in Williamsburg.
translation.fr: ni sur le Queen Mary, ni à Williamsburg.

translation.en: And not in Hill House.
The way you write, I just assumed--
translation.fr:
- Votre plume, j'en ai déduit...
- Pas mes histoires.

translation.en: Other people's stories. People like you, Irene.
translation.fr:
- Votre plume, j'en ai déduit...
- Pas mes histoires. Mais celles de gens comme vous.

translation.en: I give them the right voice, that's all.
Well...
I hope tonight is a game changer for you.
translation.fr: j'espère que ce soir sera différent.

translation.en: -How so? -Maybe my Carl
translation.fr:
Comment ça ? Mon Carl vous donnera
peut-être une histoire à vous.

translation.en: will finally give you a story of your own.
translation.fr:
Mon Carl vous donnera
peut-être une histoire à vous.

translation.en: You were one of his favorite writers, so maybe...
translation.fr: Vous étiez l'un de ses auteurs préférés,

translation.en: that's the reason... for all this.
You know, I-- I can tell you one thing about Hill House
translation.fr: Je peux vous donner un fait sur Hill House

translation.en: that isn't in the book.
Oh, yes, please.
All those years trying to understand what happened in that house, you know what I never found?
translation.fr: Vous savez ce que je n'ai jamais trouvé ?

translation.en: A reason.
So, don't expect one.
-How are your brother and sisters, -[phone ringing]
translation.fr: Votre frère et vos sœurs vont bien ?

translation.en: I wondered, since the book?
How are they doing these days?
You know who I wish would write a book?
translation.fr: Vous savez qui serait un bon auteur ?

translation.en: Your dad.
-[Young Nell] Just tonight. -[mother] Won't you miss your brother?
translation.fr: Seulement ce soir. Ton frère te manquera.

translation.en: I'd rather sleep here...
in case she comes back.
All right.
Just tonight, then.
-[softly] I'll stay with her a bit. -Okay.
Good night.
Hey, will you grab her blanket?
-[father] Yeah. -Thanks.
[Shirley exhales] I'm sorry. Uh...
So...
Are you saying you'd prefer not to do a viewing?
translation.fr: vous ne voulez pas faire de veillée ?

translation.en: No. Uh...
We want to. It's not that.
translation.fr: Nous aimerions. Ce n'est pas ça...

translation.en: It's part of your mother's pre-need, so, it's taken care of.
translation.fr: Votre mère a tout arrangé, c'est réglé.

translation.en: [woman] And we want to.
It's Max.
-I think he's just a little, um... -A little nervous about it?
translation.fr: Je pense qu'il est un peu... Agité par la situation.

translation.en: -I'd say adamantly opposed. -[Shirley] Mm-hmm.
Sorry, excuse me.
Hi, Max. I'm Shirley.
Harris Funeral Home.
I know this might be a little weird for you,
-but I promise it's all normal. -[receiver clicks]
The reason Mommy and Daddy are here
is because it's important to say goodbye to Grandma.
translation.fr: parce qu'il faut dire au revoir à mamie.

translation.en: A viewing is just a way to do that, to...
to see her one last time and tell her you love her.
translation.fr: Lui dire une dernière fois que tu l'aimes.

translation.en: I don't need to say goodbye.
A lot of people feel that way at first, but then they feel much better when they do.
translation.fr:
Beaucoup ressentent ça, au départ,
mais ils se sentent mieux après.

translation.en: That's what Mommy said.
But she was wrong.
Grammy keeps sitting on my bed at night...
translation.fr: Mamie se met sur mon lit, le soir,

translation.en: and touching my hair.
She just stares at me.
And her eyes must hurt.
Why?
Because she doesn't blink.
[Nell] It's Nell. Um... I need you to call me.
It's hard to understand, everything's so twisted... and it's hard to explain, but...
translation.fr:
C'est dur à expliquer,
tout est si flou et incompréhensible,

translation.en: I'm worried about Luke.
Have you talked to him? Call me.
It's here.
It's great.
[Nell] Please leave a message--
Hey, I think you really nailed it. It really sends a message.
translation.fr:
Tu as assuré. C'est un message fort.
Mettons-le sur le site.

translation.en: We should put it on the website. I think it'd work great in print, too.
translation.fr:
C'est un message fort.
Mettons-le sur le site. Ça rendrait bien sur papier, aussi.

translation.en: If people still read papers, that is.
translation.fr: Si les gens lisent encore, bien sûr.

translation.en: [father groaning] Oh, God.
-[coughs] -[father] This damn flue is a disaster.
-This is supposed to be easy. -[man clears throat]
-There's nothing easy about this house. -[father chuckles]
translation.fr: Rien ne l'est avec cette maison.

translation.en: You okay, Daddy?
Just trying to fix a flue. The house doesn't like it, I guess.
translation.fr: La réparation ne plaît pas à la maison.

translation.en: -Oh... Mr. Dudley found something for you. -Um.
translation.fr: M. Dudley t'a trouvé quelque chose.

translation.en: I don't know if this is gonna work, young lady.
translation.fr: Pas sûr que ça fonctionne, jeune fille.

translation.en: And I'm gonna need it back.
I got it.
Open it!
[Young Shirley] Mr. Dudley says this is a master key,
translation.fr: D'après M. Dudley, c'est un passe

translation.en: so, it's supposed to open any door in the house.
He's a weirdo.
-So is that lady. -[door rattles]
[Young Shirley] They've been taking care of this house for years and years,
translation.fr:
Ils s'occupent de la maison
depuis des années,

translation.en: so, if anyone would know where the key is...
translation.fr: donc ils devraient savoir où est la clé...

translation.en: What do you think is in there?
What if it's a cotton candy machine?
translation.fr: Une machine à barbe à papa ?

translation.en: That'd be something.
Or a pony?
[Young Shirley] Not a pony.
This isn't working.
[Young Nell] It could be a pony.
Something was moving.
I saw the shadow under the door.
translation.fr: J'ai vu l'ombre sous la porte.

translation.en: This door's been locked for years and years and years and years, so...
translation.fr:
Cette porte est verrouillée
depuis des années,

translation.en: [inhales sharply] ...if there's a pony in there, it's dead.
translation.fr: donc s'il y a un poney, il est mort.

translation.en: This one doesn't work either.
Where's the friggin' key?
-Don't say that word. -[Young Nell] You say it.
translation.fr:
- Dis pas ce mot.
- Tu le dis bien.

translation.en: The keys never work.
-Can't he just use that big hammer? -[Young Shirley] We'll find the key.
translation.fr: Et s'il utilisait le marteau ? On trouvera la clé.

translation.en: I want to see what's in there, too.
Let's go see if Daddy has any more keys.
translation.fr: Voyons si papa en a d'autres.

translation.en: Daddy! We need more keys!
translation.fr: Papa, il nous faut d'autres clés !

translation.en: -It's an emergency! -[footsteps descending stairs]
[Steve] You don't need me to tell you,
translation.fr: Pas besoin de te le dire,

translation.en: but literally everything is an emergency with Nell.
translation.fr: mais tout est urgent avec Nell.

translation.en: [Shirley] I know, but she sounded rough.
translation.fr: Je sais, mais elle semblait agitée.

translation.en: [sighs] Shirl...
Rougher than usual. She said it was about Luke.
translation.fr: Plus que d'habitude. C'est à propos de Luke.

translation.en: -Well, then call Luke. -I did.
Straight to voicemail.
Well, then he sold his phone for cash
translation.fr:
Il a vendu son téléphone
ou il est en désintox,

translation.en: or he's still in rehab, which means we stay out of it.
translation.fr:
Il a vendu son téléphone
ou il est en désintox, donc on s'en mêle pas.

translation.en: Look, I can't deal with this right now. I'm working.
translation.fr: Je peux pas m'en occuper. Je travaille.

translation.en: Yeah? You working?
That's right, Shirl. Something else you want to add?
translation.fr: Tout à fait, Shirley. Un autre commentaire ?

translation.en: Fine, I'll just handle it, shall I?
That's why everybody dumps their shit on me, isn't it, Steve?
translation.fr: C'est à ça que je sers, pas vrai, Steve ?

translation.en: 'Cause I'm the oldest. It's my job.
-Oh, wait, that's you. -Fine.
translation.fr:
- Ah non, ça, c'est toi.
- Ça va,

translation.en: -I'll handle-- -[line disconnects]
-Jesus. -[Irene] Tea?
Sure.
Thank you.
So does this stuff, you know...
-capture the supernatural? -[chuckles]
[clicks tongue] Don't believe in that word.
Which side of the bed do you sleep on?
I'm talking about the word itself. "Supernatural."
translation.fr: Je parle du mot en lui-même. "Surnaturel."

translation.en: There's natural phenomena that we understand, and then there's natural phenomena that we don't.
translation.fr:
Il y a des phénomènes qu'on comprend,
et d'autres qu'on ne comprend pas.

translation.en: Primitive humans used to die of fright during an eclipse.
translation.fr:
Les hommes primitifs craignaient
les éclipses.

translation.en: They had no idea what it was.
The eye of an angry God.
An evil spirit.
Nothing supernatural about it, though.
Once we understood what it was,
well, it was just natural.
I prefer "preternatural."
Natural phenomena that we don't quite understand yet.
translation.fr:
Un phénomène naturel
qui n'est pas encore compris.

translation.en: So does it capture that?
Uh, no, no message. Just wanted to see if he was there.
translation.fr:
Pas de message.
Je voulais savoir s'il était là.

translation.en: Uh, what was your name again?
Thanks, Paige.
[Nell] Hi, this is Nell. Please leave a message after the beep.
translation.fr: Salut, c'est Nell. Parlez après le bip.

translation.en: It's Steve. I'm sorry I missed your call.
translation.fr: C'est Steve, j'ai raté ton appel.

translation.en: Um, I talked to Shirley.
I know you're worried about Luke, but I called his rehab center
translation.fr: Tu t'inquiètes pour Luke. J'ai appelé le centre, il va bien.

translation.en: and he's fine.
translation.fr: J'ai appelé le centre, il va bien.

translation.en: [chuckles] He actually got his 90-day chip today, if you can believe that.
translation.fr:
Il a reçu son jeton des 90 jours,
aujourd'hui.

translation.en: Um, I'll be around tomorrow if you still need to chat.
translation.fr: Je suis là demain, au besoin.

translation.en: I hope you're well, Nellie.
I mean that.
♪ So let's just take it off ♪ ♪ We've waited all night So good, till sunlight ♪
[woman] Hi.
Theodora.
Jesus.
Where'd you come from? [chuckling, pants]
So what's your story?
[inhales] What do you mean?
I mean, who are you?
What do you do? Where are you from?
translation.fr: Tu fais quoi dans la vie ? Tu viens d'où ?

translation.en: -You... live in a funeral home. -[sighs]
translation.fr: Tu vis dans une maison funéraire.

translation.en: I'm here for grad school. Ah, Sociology.
translation.fr:
Moi, je suis à l'université,
en sociologie.

translation.en: I mean, the program's brutal, but...
translation.fr:
Le programme est costaud,
mais j'adore Boston.

translation.en: I love Boston, man. It's such a great town.
translation.fr:
Le programme est costaud,
mais j'adore Boston. Super ville.

translation.en: What's that about?
I'm just kind of a germophobe.
That's okay. None taken.
That was really good.
Yeah, you're damn right.
I have to work tomorrow.
Early.
'Kay.
Was it something I said?
No. We just did what we came here to do, yeah?
translation.fr: On a fait ce qu'on avait à faire.

translation.en: Okay, then.
Hi.
[Theo sighs] I know you normally prefer the company of cold stiffs, but...
translation.fr:
Tu préfères la compagnie
de gens plus froids mais...

translation.en: -[Shirley] Don't be so hard on yourself. -[Theo] I got beer.
translation.fr: T'es dure avec toi-même. J'ai de la bière.

translation.en: New friend?
-[Shirley] She coming back? -[Theo] No.
translation.fr:
On la reverra ? Non. Elle est sympa,
mais elle a trop de soucis.

translation.en: I mean, she's sweet enough, but, pile of issues.
translation.fr:
Non. Elle est sympa,
mais elle a trop de soucis.

translation.en: [Shirley] I don't think you can know much after such a quick encounter.
translation.fr: Comment t'as pu la cerner si vite ?

translation.en: Who's saying it's quick? I'm a giver.
[Shirley] You're like a guy.
You're worse than a guy. You're like a frat guy.
When I said you could live here, I wasn't expecting the pussy parade.
translation.fr:
Quand t'as emménagé,
je m'attendais pas au défilé de meufs.

translation.en: Nell called me today.
She sounded bad.
-Yeah, 'cause it sucks to be Nell. -She call you?
No. Course not. We still haven't talked since LA.
translation.fr:
- Elle t'a appelée ?
- Bien sûr que non. On a pas parlé depuis LA.

translation.en: -Theo. -Don't.
translation.fr: On a pas parlé depuis LA. Arrête. J'attends des excuses.

translation.en: I'm just waiting for an apology.
I'm drawing boundaries, which is something you might want to look into.
translation.fr: Je pose des limites, tu devrais essayer.

translation.en: What's wrong with her?
I don't know.
You never really will.
One foot in crazy and the other on a banana peel.
translation.fr: Elle vit dans un autre monde.

translation.en: Her whole life.
Boundaries.
She said it was about Luke.
I don't know, something about it... scared me.
translation.fr:
Je sais pas pourquoi,
mais ça m'a effrayée.

translation.en: Luke will show up... when he needs money.
translation.fr: Luke reviendra. Pour avoir du cash.

translation.en: I just keep thinking... what if he doesn't?
translation.fr:
J'arrête pas de penser
à l'éventualité où il ne rentrerait pas.

translation.en: Or if he does, it'll be the last time I ever see him.
translation.fr:
Ou s'il revenait,
mais pour la dernière fois.

translation.en: Boundaries.
Maybe a brick wall when it comes to Luke.
translation.fr: Voire un mur de briques avec lui.

translation.en: Nell?
[Nell] Daddy.
[stammering] Honey, are you okay? What time is it?
translation.fr: Tu vas bien ? Il est quelle heure ?

translation.en: Do you remember the Bent-Neck Lady?
translation.fr: Tu sais, la Dame au cou tordu...

translation.en: Yes.
She's back.
Okay.
Nell? Where are you?
I'm at home.
In bed.
I want you to go to Steve and Leigh's.
I-- I'm-- I'm going to drive to Orlando and... and get a flight to LA.
translation.fr:
Je vais conduire jusqu'à Orlando
et prendre un avion pour LA.

translation.en: You-- Steve's closest. You go to him.
translation.fr: Steve est pas loin. Va chez lui.

translation.en: Okay, now, I'll see-- I'll see you there tomorrow.
I love you, Daddy.
Are you... okay?
I'm fine.
[sniffles] I'm sorry to wake you.
Good night, Daddy.
I-- I don't know. She-- she wouldn't--
translation.fr: Je sais pas. Elle voulait pas...

translation.en: Yeah, I'm going. I'm going.
[softly] Get up.
-Stevie, get up. -Dad? -What-- What's going on? -Get up.
translation.fr:
- Steve, lève-toi.
- Papa ? Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?

translation.en: -We gotta get out of here. -[Young Steve] Why?
translation.fr:
Debout. On s'en va, maintenant. - Pourquoi ? Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?
- En silence.

translation.en: -What's going on? -[father] Quietly, quietly.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi ? Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?
- En silence.

translation.en: -[Young Steve] My shoes. -[father] Shh.
[softly] We're gonna run.
-[Young Steve] Dad, what's going on? -[softly] Quiet.
I'm gonna carry you.
Dad, I--
You keep your eyes closed, no matter what you hear.
translation.fr:
Garde les yeux fermés,
quoi que tu entendes.

translation.en: You don't open them.
You promise?
-I-- I-- -Do you promise?
I promise.
You keep your eyes closed, no matter what.
translation.fr: Tu gardes bien les yeux fermés.

translation.en: You keep them closed.
[father] Eyes closed.
Get back in the car!
I saw Abigail in the window!
translation.fr: J'ai vu Abigail à la fenêtre.

translation.en: She was in the window!
[sobs] What's happening? What's happening? Where's Mom?
translation.fr: Il se passe quoi ? Où est maman ?

translation.en: I-- I thought I saw her upstairs!
-[Young Nell coughs] -That's not Mom.
What about Mom?
Dad! We can't leave Mom!
Dad! Dad! Dad!
Dad, I told you, there's no reason you and I need to talk.
translation.fr: Papa, on a aucune raison de se parler.

translation.en: You don't just get to call me and tell me what to do.
translation.fr: Tu peux pas m'appeler et dicter ta loi.

translation.en: You're closest, and your sister needs you.
translation.fr: T'es pas loin, elle a besoin de toi.

translation.en: You get home and you stay with her. You keep your eye on her.
translation.fr:
Rentre et reste avec elle.
Veille sur elle, ne la lâche pas.

translation.en: -Don't let her out of your sight. -Dad, I'm not even--
translation.fr:
Rentre et reste avec elle.
Veille sur elle, ne la lâche pas. - Je ne...
- Je vous rejoins là-bas.

translation.en: I'll see you there. I'll meet you there.
translation.fr:
- Je ne...
- Je vous rejoins là-bas.

translation.en: [scoffs] Living at home right now.
translation.fr: ...vis pas chez moi en ce moment.

translation.en: [softly] Nellie's in the Red Room.
translation.fr: Nell est dans la chambre rouge.

translation.en: [Steve] Used to be a stop sign there until recently, yes?
translation.fr: Il y avait un panneau stop, avant, non ?

translation.en: [Irene] I don't know.
I think so.
There's a pole there, see? But no sign.
translation.fr: Il y a un poteau, là. Mais pas de panneau.

translation.en: [Steve] Kids take 'em for their dorm rooms.
translation.fr: Les étudiants les piquent pour la déco.

translation.en: It's a moderately trafficked area.
translation.fr: Il y a peu de circulation.

translation.en: A four-way stop without a sign is bound to have a few near misses.
translation.fr:
Un carrefour sans panneau
est voué à causer des accidents.

translation.en: You slept better with your husband in bed, right?
translation.fr: Vous dormiez mieux avec votre mari ?

translation.en: Of course.
You're probably just noticing the car horns now
translation.fr:
Vous remarquez les klaxons
parce que vous ne dormez plus.

translation.en: because you're not sleeping as well. Things you used to sleep through.
translation.fr:
Vous remarquez les klaxons
parce que vous ne dormez plus. Vous avez le sommeil léger.

translation.en: The water.
There was a big storm the night he died.
translation.fr: Il y a eu une tempête à sa mort.

translation.en: One of the biggest you've seen in a long time.
Yes.
[sighs] There's a leak in your roof.
You just didn't notice the water damage because of all the paneling.
translation.fr:
Vous ne remarquiez pas
la fuite à cause du lambris.

translation.en: It was only drizzling last night, and I even got a few drips.
translation.fr:
Malgré la faible pluie,
j'ai senti des gouttes.

translation.en: You might wanna get that looked at. Water damage is no joke.
translation.fr:
Faites réparer cela.
Les fuites, c'est du sérieux.

translation.en: Happens all the time, Irene.
And the man I saw hanging from my ceiling?
translation.fr:
Et l'homme
que j'ai vu suspendu au plafond ?

translation.en: The mind...
It is a powerful thing, ma'am.
Especially the grieving mind.
I know what I saw.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que j'ai vu.

translation.en: The water and the car horns...
you'd be picturing how he died as much as you wouldn't want to.
translation.fr:
Vous imaginez sa mort,
que vous le vouliez ou non.

translation.en: -I saw him. -When you push that stuff down...
translation.fr: Je l'ai vu. En essayant de tout refouler,

translation.en: it comes out at night. You couldn't help it.
translation.fr: ça ressurgit la nuit, malgré vous.

translation.en: When I said I've never seen a ghost, that's not exactly true.
translation.fr:
J'ai dit ne jamais avoir vu de fantôme,
ce n'est pas exact.

translation.en: I've seen a lot of ghosts.
Just not the way you think.
A ghost can be a lot of things.
A memory, a daydream, a secret.
translation.fr: Un souvenir, une rêverie, un secret,

translation.en: Grief, anger, guilt.
translation.fr: le deuil, la colère, la culpabilité.

translation.en: But in my experience...
translation.fr: Mais de ce que je sais,

translation.en: most times, they're just what we want to see.
translation.fr: souvent, c'est ce que nous voulons voir.

translation.en: Why would I want to see my Carl like that?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi je voudrais voir mon Carl
dans cet état ?

translation.en: Because it's better than never seeing him again.
translation.fr:
Parce que c'est mieux
que de ne jamais le revoir.

translation.en: Most times, a ghost is a wish.
Thank you for doing that.
Carl would have loved it. My pleasure.
translation.fr:
- Carl aurait adoré.
- Je vous en prie.

translation.en: The fuck, Steve?
-You didn't like it. -No, I didn't like it.
translation.fr:
- Il t'a pas plu.
- Non, pas du tout.

translation.en: What's going on?
My brother just raped the family is what's going on. Hang on.
translation.fr:
- Mon frère a violé notre famille.
- Attends...

translation.en: Look, I get that things haven't exactly been going well with your writing
translation.fr:
Je comprends
que ta carrière ne décolle pas.

translation.en: and when you said you wanted to do a book about the house, I understood that, but this is--
translation.fr:
Quand tu as dit vouloir écrire
sur la maison, j'ai compris...

translation.en: I sent you guys the manuscript in case you had any objections.
translation.fr:
Je vous ai envoyé l'ébauche,
au cas où vous émettriez des réserves.

translation.en: -I-- I didn't have to do that. -Of course we object. I object, Steve!
translation.fr:
Je vous ai envoyé l'ébauche,
au cas où vous émettriez des réserves. Bien sûr que j'ai des réserves, Steve.

translation.en: -Let's calm down a bit. -You be calm, Leigh. It's not your name in here.
translation.fr:
- On se calme un peu.
- C'est pas ton nom, dedans !

translation.en: It's not your family.
Hey, it is my family.
You weren't there.
Nell, Luke, Theo, they were just kids. Things they told you in confidence--
translation.fr:
C'étaient des enfants.
Ils se sont confiés à toi...

translation.en: -I'm clear that they were kids. -You make Mom sound fucking crazy.
translation.fr:
- Ça, je le précise.
- Maman a l'air folle.

translation.en: -Oh, Mom wasn't crazy? -[Shirley] And the Dudleys and Dad?
translation.fr:
- Elle l'était pas ?
- Les Dudley et papa ?

translation.en: This is the worst of the bullshit, worse than the tabloids.
translation.fr:
C'est des conneries.
Pire que les tabloïds.

translation.en: Dad had every opportunity to set that straight.
[chuckles] What am I supposed to write? He said it was haunted.
translation.fr: Je dois écrire quoi ? Elle est hantée.

translation.en: -Those are his words. -He was a wreck.
-He'd just lost his wife. -And he hasn't said shit since.
translation.fr:
- Il avait perdu sa femme.
- Il a rien dit, depuis.

translation.en: Does he talk to you, Shirl? Did he tell you what happened that night?
translation.fr:
Il t'a raconté
les événements de cette nuit-là ?

translation.en: Because all I've got are those tabloid quotes.
translation.fr: J'ai que la version des tabloïds.

translation.en: He refuses to tell us anything else.
translation.fr: Il veut rien nous dire d'autre.

translation.en: He believed it, Steve.
When he said those things, he believed them.
translation.fr: Il y croyait dur comme fer.

translation.en: In the moment, at least, and-- and you never did.
translation.fr: Sur le moment, du moins, mais toi non.

translation.en: Neither did you.
translation.fr:
- Toi non plus.
- Tu ressasses tout ça.

translation.en: And now you're digging up that stuff? For a buck?
translation.fr:
- Toi non plus.
- Tu ressasses tout ça. Pour un billet ?

translation.en: So you can stop living off credit for a change?
translation.fr:
- Pour ne plus vivre à crédit.
- Un billet ?

translation.en: -"A buck"? -Look, I can tell that you're upset, -but Steve had every right-- -A buck?
translation.fr:
Je comprends ta colère,
mais Steve a le droit...

translation.en: Do you know how much money they're offering on the advance?
translation.fr:
Un billet ?
Tu sais combien ils me proposent ?

translation.en: We can buy a house, we can move to LA. We can...
translation.fr:
On pourrait s'acheter une maison
et vivre à LA...

translation.en: I need to start a real life, for my own family.
translation.fr: Je dois repartir de zéro, pour ma famille.

translation.en: We're your family, Steve.
-What you're doing to Mom-- -Mom was mentally ill.
translation.fr: Ce que tu fais à maman... Elle était malade. C'est la réalité.

translation.en: It's a fact.
translation.fr: Elle était malade. C'est la réalité.

translation.en: I'll be damned if the apple didn't fall too far from...
translation.fr: Les chiens ne font pas des chats...

translation.en: I'm-- I'm sorry.
I'm-- I'm sorry, that wasn't--
Nobody's buying the novels, Shirl.
You sent me the book.
Now you know what I think.
You publish this, you know what it costs.
[Shirley] You know what it costs.
I'll write your story.
It's a good story.
I... researched your house. Did you know it was used as a hospice briefly in the '60s?
translation.fr:
J'ai fait des recherches. Vous saviez
que votre maison servait d'hospice ?

translation.en: I didn't.
I'd like to talk to you some more about your marriage,
translation.fr:
Je voudrais en savoir plus
sur votre mariage

translation.en: and get some background on Carl. Who he was...
translation.fr: et sur la vie de Carl. Qui il était.

translation.en: Who you both were.
That's what matters, really.
I'll need to take some liberties.
I always do.
But I promise to be respectful.
He was a fan.
I'll do it in a way he would have really liked.
translation.fr: Je ferai en sorte que ça lui plaise.

translation.en: You really didn't see anything.
-[father] They didn't see anything. -That's not the point.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont rien vu. Là n'est pas la question.

translation.en: My kids don't take the stand, Ross. I had my eyes closed when we left.
translation.fr:
- Ils ne témoigneront pas...
- Mes yeux étaient fermés.

translation.en: You don't say anything, Stevie.
-No one can corroborate your story, Hugh. -That's right.
translation.fr:
- Personne ne peut t'appuyer, Hugh.
- C'est exact.

translation.en: [man] The judge hears you talk about packing five kids into your car,
translation.fr:
Si le juge apprend
que tu les as pris à 3 h du matin,

translation.en: they're gonna wonder why they aren't hearing from those kids.
translation.fr:
il se demandera
pourquoi ils ne témoignent pas.

translation.en: The media is already piling on.
If we don't give 'em someone else to write about,
translation.fr: Il leur faut un nouveau sujet,

translation.en: it's gonna be more and more of this.
translation.fr: sinon il y aura plus de ça.

translation.en: [Younger Hugh sighs] It's tabloids.
-It's just tabloids -[man] It's Family Court.
translation.fr: Rien d'autre. C'est la grande instance.

translation.en: This type of stuff doesn't help in a custody hearing.
translation.fr: Ça n'aide pas pour une demande de garde.

translation.en: [Younger Hugh] They never filed charges. I was never placed under arrest.
translation.fr:
Ils n'ont pas porté plainte.
Je n'ai jamais été arrêté.

translation.en: It was a suicide.
-They confirmed it. -[man] It doesn't matter.
They got this off your statement to the police!
translation.fr: Ils ont tiré ça de ta déposition.

translation.en: I wasn't thinking clearly that night. We just lean on that.
translation.fr: Je n'étais pas moi-même cette nuit-là.

translation.en: -We can't un-ring this bell. -Okay, fine, they can rip me to pieces,
translation.fr:
C'est trop tard. Ils peuvent me détruire,
mais qu'ils laissent les enfants.

translation.en: but they don't get to take bites out of the kids.
translation.fr:
Ils peuvent me détruire,
mais qu'ils laissent les enfants.

translation.en: [man] It'd just go a long way if you'd let the press near the house.
translation.fr: Laisse la presse s'approcher de la maison.

translation.en: Hell, they'll pay you.
They'll pay you to walk the grounds, take some pictures.
translation.fr:
Pour pénétrer les lieux
et prendre des photos.

translation.en: No one goes near the house.
Just the police.
[sniffles] No one else has to.
Then sell it. You need the money, Hugh.
translation.fr: Alors, vends-la. Tu as besoin d'argent.

translation.en: No.
You're saying you wanna keep the house your wife just died in?
translation.fr:
Tu veux garder la maison
où ta femme est morte ?

translation.en: You have any idea how that looks?
I want the gates...
and the doors kept locked at all times,
translation.fr: Les portails et les portes devront être verrouillés,

translation.en: and I wanna know every day that it's empty.
translation.fr:
et je veux qu'on m'assure
que personne n'y entrera.

translation.en: No gardeners.
No staff.
Except for the Dudleys.
The Dudleys stay on.
[man] That doesn't make any sense.
The Dudleys stay on, and it sits there and rots.
translation.fr: Les Dudley restent, et on laisse la maison pourrir !

translation.en: I'm sorry you had to hear that.
If you lose? I won't.
translation.fr:
- Et si tu perds ?
- C'est impossible.

translation.en: If you do, though?
Do we really have to go live with Aunt Janet?
translation.fr: On vivra vraiment avec tante Janet ?

translation.en: [Leigh] Hello.
Hey.
What do you want?
So my sister...
There's something up with Nell.
translation.fr: Y a un problème avec Nell.

translation.en: -She may show up at the house today. -[Leigh] At my house?
translation.fr:
- Elle pourrait se pointer.
- Chez moi ?

translation.en: The house, yeah.
Why?
My dad told her to. I didn't get a chance to tell him, it's...
translation.fr: À cause de mon père. J'ai pas pu lui dire...

translation.en: But I'm sorry. You can just point her to me.
[sighs] Is that all?
Maybe... I can come by, and we can talk about this some more.
translation.fr:
Je peux passer
pour qu'on discute un peu plus ?

translation.en: You know what you'd have to say. You tell me.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que j'attends. À toi de voir.

translation.en: Is there any point?
Hello, young man.
[Young Steve] What're you doing?
Arranging the china and some of the flatware,
translation.fr: Je sors la porcelaine et la vaisselle,

translation.en: so that your father can sell them.
translation.fr: pour que ton père les vende.

translation.en: These are valuable.
Dad says you and Mr. Dudley come with the house.
translation.fr: Vous et M. Dudley venez avec la maison.

translation.en: Houses like this one require a staff.
translation.fr:
Les grandes maisons
requièrent des employés.

translation.en: Why don't you live here?
We live close by.
At the edge of the property, through the woods, right by town.
translation.fr:
En bordure de la propriété,
dans les bois, près de la ville.

translation.en: But there are so many rooms.
translation.fr: Mais il y a plein de chambres.

translation.en: The staff hasn't lived on the grounds since 1948.
translation.fr:
Les employés ne vivent plus ici
depuis 1948.

translation.en: So the people that lived here before us...
translation.fr: Ceux qui ont vécu ici avant nous...

translation.en: The Hills.
So they were all alone?
-Oh, yes. -[slides chair]
No one would live nearer than town.
translation.fr: Personne n'osait s'éloigner de la ville.

translation.en: No one will come any nearer than that.
So, yes.
They lived all alone.
In the night.
In the dark.
Well, they didn't seem to be too scared.
My dad found a bunch of stuff in the parlor.
translation.fr: Mon père a trouvé des trucs dans le salon.

translation.en: Tarot cards and Ouija boards and all that.
translation.fr:
Des cartes de tarots
et des planches de Ouija.

translation.en: So, something tells me they weren't too scared of the dark.
translation.fr: Donc, ils n'avaient pas peur du noir.

translation.en: [Mrs. Dudley] I see.
And you know what those things do, don't you?
translation.fr: Tu sais à quoi servent ces objets ?

translation.en: They're parlor games. People use them to scare themselves.
translation.fr: À passer le temps. Les gens veulent se faire peur.

translation.en: This is the problem with schools these days.
translation.fr:
C'est le problème avec les écoles,
de nos jours.

translation.en: They teach you the secular world,
translation.fr: On vous enseigne une vie profane,

translation.en: smother you in science.
And science isn't an exact science, you know.
translation.fr:
mais ce n'est pas une science exacte,
tu sais.

translation.en: The world is dark, young man,
and the only light is the light of the Lord Jesus Christ.
translation.fr:
et la seule lumière
est celle de Jésus Christ.

translation.en: We need his light in the night.
translation.fr: Nous en avons besoin, la nuit, dans le noir.

translation.en: In the dark.
Do you know the Gospels, young man?
[mother] He does.
Hugh and I decided when Steve was little.
translation.fr:
On a pris notre décision
quand Steve était petit.

translation.en: See, we knew that throughout his life he'd be exposed to all sorts of ideas and beliefs.
translation.fr:
On savait qu'il serait exposé à toutes
sortes d'opinions et de croyances.

translation.en: That there'd be all sorts of people who'd tell him they had the answers.
translation.fr:
Et que beaucoup prétendraient
détenir les réponses.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I meant no offense.
translation.fr: Je ne pensais pas à mal.

translation.en: [chuckles] So yes, he knows the Gospels.
He's also familiar with the Talmud.
translation.fr: Il a aussi entendu parler du Talmud,

translation.en: The Tao Te Ching, the Torah, the Koran, Greek mythology.
translation.fr: du Dao de jing, de la Torah, du Coran, de la mythologie grecque.

translation.en: And he reads a lot of Carl Sagan, Shakespeare.
translation.fr: Il lit aussi Carl Sagan et Shakespeare.

translation.en: Why is that, honey?
"Because there are more things in Heaven and Earth, Horatio..."
translation.fr:
"Il y a plus de choses
dans le ciel et sur Terre, Horatio...

translation.en: "...than are dreamt of in your philosophy."
Very good, ma'am.
Well, I don't suppose either of you have seen Luke.
translation.fr: L'un de vous aurait vu Luke ?

translation.en: Not recently.
I assume you tried the tree house?
translation.fr: Tu as cherché dans la cabane ?

translation.en: [chuckles] Very funny, mister.
Mom's looking for you.
Trying every closet.
translation.fr: Elle a fouillé tous les placards.

translation.en: It never occurs to her you'll be in your tree house. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Elle ne pense jamais à la cabane.

translation.en: You know, the one Dad built for you?
I don't wanna go in yet.
I don't like it inside.
-No rush, my man. -[Luke sighs deeply]
-What you making? -A new sign.
translation.fr:
- Tu fais quoi ?
- Un nouveau panneau.

translation.en: How do you spell "no girls allowed"?
translation.fr: Comment on écrit : "Pas de filles ici" ?

translation.en: [Young Steve] N-O.
-I already got those. -[Young Steve] G...
I told you last time, that's a bad idea.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit que c'était une mauvaise idée.

translation.en: -What happened to your other sign? -[Young Luke] Theo ripped it.
translation.fr: Et l'autre panneau, alors ? Theo l'a déchiré.

translation.en: I'll bet. I.
Is this the family?
-[Young Luke] Yep. -[Young Steve] R.
Who's this? [Young Luke] Some girl I saw by the woods.
translation.fr:
- C'est qui ?
- Une fille que j'ai vue près des bois.

translation.en: What's next?
L.
You know, I used to have imaginary friends, too.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, j'avais des amis imaginaires.

translation.en: They go away when you get bigger.
translation.fr: Ils s'en vont, quand tu grandis.

translation.en: S.
She's not imaginary.
Okay. "No girls."
Theo can't rip this one. It's not allowed.
translation.fr: Theo peut pas le déchirer. C'est interdit.

translation.en: I'll tell her.
Will you hang out with me?
translation.fr: Tu restes un peu avec moi ?

translation.en: -You want me to? -Yeah.
translation.fr: T'en as envie ? Oui, tu peux jouer avec moi tout le temps.

translation.en: You can hang out all the time.
translation.fr: Oui, tu peux jouer avec moi tout le temps.

translation.en: We can draw together.
No girls.
Just Stevie and Luke.
Cool kids.
Where do you get the ideas for these drawings?
translation.fr: De quoi tu t'inspires pour ces dessins ?

translation.en: Fother mucker.
Hey, Luke.
Hey-- Hey, Steve.
Well, uh, this isn't what it looks like. Um...
translation.fr: C'est pas ce que tu crois.

translation.en: I'm, uh... [shivering]
Are you cold?
Yeah.
How'd you know where to find me?
[sighs] Tell you what, I've got--
Let me see.
I've got 200 bucks here.
You hand me that iPad, you can keep the cash and sell that old camera.
translation.fr:
Rends-moi l'iPad, tu peux avoir l'argent
et vendre l'appareil.

translation.en: Uh, I need the iPad.
It stays here.
I'm-- I'm sorry.
I know.
You know, it really isn't what you think.
translation.fr: C'est pas ce que tu crois.

translation.en: -[sniffs] -Good.
Here.
Thanks.
I needed a good scare.
Leigh sent you here?
I tried to tell Dad we're... [sighs] ...we're having some issues,
translation.fr:
J'ai essayé de dire à papa
qu'on est en froid...

translation.en: Did you tell Luke where I live?
translation.fr: T'as dit à Luke où j'habitais ?

translation.en: Did you bring him here?
You just stood there and watched him loot me?
translation.fr: T'es restée là, à le regarder me voler ?

translation.en: Christ, Nell.
So you hit up everybody, dragged Luke out,
translation.fr: Tu contactes tout le monde, fais sortir Luke

translation.en: made Dad hop on a plane.
translation.fr: et forces papa à prendre l'avion.

translation.en: Fine.
You got us all listening. What do you want?
translation.fr: On t'écoute. Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?

translation.en: What's so damn important, Nell?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui est si important, Nell ?

translation.en: Shit, I didn't give him the address.
translation.fr: PAPA Merde, je lui ai pas filé l'adresse.

translation.en: Hey, I tried to tell you, we're--
translation.fr:
- J'ai essayé de te prévenir, mais...
- Steve...

translation.en: -[Hugh] Steve-- -[Steve] Dad? About Nell--
translation.fr:
- Papa ?
- C'est au sujet de Nell.

translation.en: I can't hear you.
You hear me? I said it's about Nell.
-I know, I just walked in, and she's-- -Nell was lying.
translation.fr: Je suis entré et elle... Nell a menti.

translation.en: [scoffs] Shocking.
She wasn't in LA. She was at the house, Steve.
translation.fr:
Elle était pas à LA.
Elle était à la maison, Steve.

translation.en: She was at the house.
She...
She's dead. She's dead.
Steve?
-[Hugh] Steve? -[panting]
You there?
Steve?
Steve, you there?
